list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update `.gitignore` and `.idea` settings
- Ignored `tests/` directory in `.gitignore`. - Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` with changes to GitHub account ID, recent files, task settings, and active configuration.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Default task
add initial project structure and configuration files for the AI
add initial project structure and configuration files for the AI
add initial project structure and configuration files for the AI
add initial project structure and configuration files for the AI
add initial project structure and configuration files for the AI

Add new scripts and files for AI model data analysis
This commit introduces initial scripts and structures for analyzing network capture files and dataset preprocessing. Key additions include a PCAP analysis script, dataset checker, and various utility modules. Documentation and sample outputs are also included for debugging and testing.

Add new scripts and files for AI model data analysis
This commit introduces initial scripts and structures for analyzing network capture files and dataset preprocessing. Key additions include a PCAP analysis script, dataset checker, and various utility modules. Documentation and sample outputs are also included for debugging and testing.

Add initial AI model analysis and data processing scripts
This commit adds foundational scripts for analyzing PCAP files, loading and preprocessing NSL-KDD datasets, and managing the MantaGuard AI model pipeline. Updates include `analyze_capture.py`, `check_dataset.py`, and `data_loader.py`, along with sample outputs and initial `.gitignore` configurations for clarity and efficiency.

Add initial AI model analysis and data processing scripts
This commit adds foundational scripts for analyzing PCAP files, loading and preprocessing NSL-KDD datasets, and managing the MantaGuard AI model pipeline. Updates include `analyze_capture.py`, `check_dataset.py`, and `data_loader.py`, along with sample outputs and initial `.gitignore` configurations for clarity and efficiency.

Remove unused Zeek log files and improve model file handling
Deleted redundant Zeek output logs to declutter the repository. Enhanced model file detection logic in timed_capture.py with fallback warnings and included detailed error messages for missing model files.

Remove large combined scan CSV file from repository
The file `combined_scan_20250423_134837.csv` was removed due to its large size and potential redundancy. Keeping it in the repository could negatively impact performance and storage.

Enhance MantaGuard UI and session state management
- Improved sidebar navigation to preserve user selections during reruns. - Added functionality to display scan completion messages and manage refresh behavior. - Updated retrain_ocsvm.py to allow optional labeled anomalies for model retraining. - Adjusted model directory paths in timed_capture.py for consistency. - Modified unknown_categories.json to include new entries and improve categorization.

Enhance MantaGuard UI and session state management
- Improved sidebar navigation to preserve user selections during reruns. - Added functionality to display scan completion messages and manage refresh behavior. - Updated retrain_ocsvm.py to allow optional labeled anomalies for model retraining. - Adjusted model directory paths in timed_capture.py for consistency. - Modified unknown_categories.json to include new entries and improve categorization.

Remove outdated data preprocessing and evaluation scripts.
Deprecated scripts related to dataset preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation have been removed to streamline the codebase. These functionalities are likely replaced or no longer aligned with the current design.
Optimized the "Upload PCAP" and later use of analyze_capture.py

Add UID-based PCAP extraction script and enhance UI workflows.
Added `extract_flow_by_uid.py` for extracting flows by UID from Zeek logs and PCAPs. Enhanced MantaGuard's UI to integrate PCAP extraction with anomaly predictions, and adjusted related files for seamless workflow improvements.
Clean up `.idea/workspace.xml` to remove redundant changes and reformat properties.
Clean up `.idea/workspace.xml` to remove redundant changes and reformat properties.
Refractored the original MANTAGUARD.py into smaller separate files.
Add base HTML template and initial structure for Home, Reports, Scanning, and Fix & Patches pages with placeholder content.
Add comprehensive security analytics, API endpoints, and professional styling for the reports page.
Revamp Home and Scanning pages with professional design: added advanced styling, interactive components, and enhanced UX elements.
Introduce parallax effects and fixed background to Home page, enhance hero section design, and add interactive scrolling animations for improved user experience.
Clean up `.idea` shelf files and streamline `unknown_categories.json` structure with reordered entries for consistency.

🗑 Remove legacy scripts and orphaned files during project restructuring
This commit removes unused and redundant scripts/files as part of the restructuring process to streamline the project and improve maintainability.

🏗 Initiate project restructuring into professional Python package format
This commit establishes a structured foundation for MantaGuard by reorganizing it into a professional Python package. Key additions include:
- Standardized directory structure with `mantaguard` and `tests` modules. - Created base `__init__.py` files for core submodules (network, AI, web, security, utils, etc.). - Added `.gitkeep` for maintaining essential directory structure.
Future commits will expand upon this restructuring to further enhance modularity, maintainability, and scalability for the project.
Refine "Fix & Patches" naming, implement detailed styling enhancements for tables, modals, and tabs, and improve visualization generation error handling in `PcapAnalyzer`.

Add utilities for model metrics, safety, and training validation
This update introduces new utility modules to enhance model evaluation, safety, and training workflows.
**Key Additions:** - **`model_metrics.py`**: Provides real-world metrics calculation for trained models using validation data. - **`model_safety.py`**: Implements backup, validation, and rollback features for model safety operations. - **`training_validation.py`**: Validates training data and parameters before retraining, ensuring data quality and readiness.
These tools improve model reliability, data management, and training robustness.

Introduce ML Training Center UI
Added a new **ML Training Center** interface to enhance data filtering, anomaly labeling, and model training workflows.
### Highlights: - Interactive connection table with advanced filtering, sorting, and bulk actions. - **Bulk labeling panel** for streamlined anomaly categorization. - **Statistics cards** to display overview metrics (e.g., total anomalies, labeled items). - **Training readiness indicators** for anomaly detection and attack classification models. - Improved UI styling for seamless usability, including notification systems, modals, and pagination.
This addition establishes a robust foundation for managing connections, anomalies, and training data within the platform. Future updates will integrate live data handling and expanded training functionalities.

Introduce ML Training Center UI
Added a new **ML Training Center** interface to enhance data filtering, anomaly labeling, and model training workflows.
### Highlights: - Interactive connection table with advanced filtering, sorting, and bulk actions. - **Bulk labeling panel** for streamlined anomaly categorization. - **Statistics cards** to display overview metrics (e.g., total anomalies, labeled items). - **Training readiness indicators** for anomaly detection and attack classification models. - Improved UI styling for seamless usability, including notification systems, modals, and pagination.
This addition establishes a robust foundation for managing connections, anomalies, and training data within the platform. Future updates will integrate live data handling and expanded training functionalities.

Update `.gitignore` and `.idea` settings
- Ignored `tests/` directory in `.gitignore`. - Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` with changes to GitHub account ID, recent files, task settings, and active configuration.
